title: Coop Add-On Requirements
description: A set of requirements for cooperative Add-On projects. See https://learn.microsoft.com/minecraft/creator/documents/practices/guidelinesforbuildingcooperativeaddons for more info.

fields.title: No Loose Files
fields.description: In a cooperative Add-On, there should not be any 'loose files' - e.g., <pack>/entities/this_is_a_loose_file.json - inside of a folder.
fields.howToUse: Move loose files into a creator-namespaced subfolder. For example, move entities/my_mob.json to entities/creatorname_gamename/my_mob.json to avoid conflicts with other add-ons.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the path of the loose file found

fields.title: No Common Folder Names
fields.description: Creator folders - e.g., <pack>/entities/<custom folder name> - should not be a 'common' name. It should probably be in the form <creator_short_name>_<game_shortName>. See attached list of creator names.
fields.howToUse: Rename the folder to use a unique prefix like 'creatorname_gamename'. For example, rename 'entities/mobs' to 'entities/myname_mygame'. This prevents conflicts when multiple add-ons are installed together.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the forbidden common folder name used

fields.title: Loose Creator File
fields.description: Cooperative Add-Ons should not have loose files directly in creator folders.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the path of the loose file found

fields.title: Multiple Creator Folders
fields.description: Found more than one folder in creator folder besides common shared folders.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the folder names found

fields.title: Unsupported Folder Name
fields.description: Type folder contains unsupported subfolder names that don't follow cooperative Add-On conventions.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the unsupported folder name

fields.title: Multiple Type Folders
fields.description: Found more than one folder in the type folder, which may indicate naming convention issues.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the folder names found

fields.title: Loose Type Files
fields.description: Type folders should not contain loose files in cooperative Add-Ons.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the path of the loose file found

fields.title: No Dimension Elements
fields.description: Cooperative Add-Ons should not contain dimension-related elements.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the dimension element path found

fields.title: No UI Elements
fields.description: Cooperative Add-Ons should not contain custom UI elements.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the UI element path found

fields.title: BP Manifest Missing
fields.description: Expected exactly one behavior pack manifest.json but found none or multiple.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the count of manifests found

fields.title: RP Manifest Missing
fields.description: Expected exactly one resource pack manifest.json but found none or multiple.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the count of manifests found

fields.title: RP Manifest Count
fields.description: Expected exactly one resource pack manifest.json but found incorrect count.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the count of manifests found

fields.title: BP Manifest Invalid
fields.description: The behavior pack manifest.json file is not valid or cannot be parsed.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the validation error message

fields.title: BP-RP Dependency Missing
fields.description: Expected exactly one dependency from behavior pack to resource pack but found none or multiple.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the dependency count found

fields.title: BP-RP Dependency Invalid
fields.description: The dependency from behavior pack to resource pack is not valid.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the validation error message

fields.title: RP-BP Dependency Missing
fields.description: Expected exactly one dependency from resource pack to behavior pack but found none or multiple.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the dependency count found

fields.title: RP-BP Dependency Invalid
fields.description: The dependency from resource pack to behavior pack is not valid.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the validation error message
